actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.
Referred to Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Soil and Water Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize a national soil conservation program utilizing incentives to landowners to install and maintain conservation measures meeting certain standards and to establish a pilot program to test the purchase of conservation benefits, and for other purposes.

summary.text: National Soil Conservation Act of 1981 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a cost-sharing program with landowners and operators for the conservation of soil, water, and related resources. Bases such agreements and conservation standards on local conditions. Authorizes a five-year pilot program to test the purchase of conservation benefits. Authorizes necessary appropriations for such programs through fiscal year 1986.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a national soil conservation program utilizing incentives to landowners to install and maintain conservation measures meeting certain standards and to establish a pilot program to test the purchase of conservation benefits, and for other purposes.
